Sample glyph for valr functions

Sample glyph for valr functions

bed_glyph(expr, label = NULL, res_name = "result")

Arguments

expr
expression to evaluate
label
col name for label output
res_name
name of result in output

Value

ggplot

Examples

x <- tibble::tribble(
 ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
 'chr1', 25,     50,
 'chr1', 100,    125
)

y <- tibble::tribble(
  ~chrom, ~start, ~end, ~value,
  'chr1', 30,     75,  50
)

bed_glyph(bed_intersect(x, y))

x <- tibble::tribble(
  ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
  'chr1', 30,     75,
  'chr1', 50,     90,
  'chr1', 91,     120
)

bed_glyph(bed_merge(x), label = '.id')
bed_glyph(bed_cluster(x), label = '.id')
